mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet_post (title, summary, content, category, cover_image_url, author_id, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{category}, #{coverImageUrl}, #{authorId}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE pet_post SET status = #{status}, rejection_reason = #{rejectionReason}, audit_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE pet_post SET likes = likes + #{amount} WHERE id = #{postId}
UPDATE pet_post SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{postId}
